subject: Re: Can I make junit run a testcase with difference setUp()?

messageBody:
Take a look at junit.extensions.TestSetup

This lets you wrap a test with a custom setUp() and tearDown().
If you can wrap a test, you can wrap a testSuite.
Now you can have a setUp and tearDown for the suite as a whole, as
well as having a setUp and tearDown for each test in the suite.

I found this technique in Pragmatic Unit Testing
http://www.pragmaticprogrammer.com/sk/ut/

Regards,
Nick
